a11y-img-2: Koho i ke koho ʻia ma ka papa kuhikuhi UI widget
a11y-img-3: Hiki ke kamaʻilio i ka pahu kūkākūkā ma widget UI
about-advisors-brendan: Luna Nui o Brave. ʻO Co-hoʻokumu o Mozilla. Mea hana o ka ʻōlelo polokalamu JavaScript. ʻO ka mea kūkulu hale kele pūnaewele a me nā mea hou aʻe.
about-advisors-dawn: Polofesa, CS ma ke Kulanui o Kaleponi, Berkeley. Ke aʻo hohonu, palekana, poloka poloka. Luna Nui o Oasis Labs.
about-advisors-keiran: ʻEpekema ʻimi noiʻi ma Stanford. Ke aʻo ʻana i ka mīkini a me ke kālā nui ma nā panakō nui, nā pale pale, a me ka ʻepekema.
about-content-head-1: Ka mea a mākou e hana ai
about-content-head-2: No ke aha he mea nui
about-content-text-1: He lawelawe ʻo hCaptcha o ka Intuition Machines Inc, kahi hui aʻo aʻo a me ka mīkini me ka nānā ʻana i ka hao a me ka ʻike ʻike ML ma ka pālākiō. Kūkulu a hana mākou i nā ʻōnaehana nui e hiki ai i nā lawelawe loiloi wikiō a me nā kiʻi no nā ʻoihana Global 2000 a puni ka honua.
about-content-text-1a: Lawe ʻo hCaptcha i kahi ala hou, ʻike pilikino i ka hoʻōki ʻana i nā bots.
about-content-text-1b: Hōʻike mākou i nā pilikia CAPTCHA paʻakikī no nā bots akā maʻalahi no ka poʻe ma o ka hōʻiliʻili ʻana i nā ʻikepili paʻakikī i ka lepili mai nā pilikia aʻo ʻana i ka mīkini, a me ka hoʻohana ʻana e hoʻokaʻawale inā he kanaka a he malihini kipa pūnaewele paha.
about-content-text-2: Hana nā ʻike hou aʻe i nā hopena maikaʻi aʻe. ʻO ke kūkulu ʻana a me ka mālama pono ʻana i nā ʻikepili a pili pono ka manawa a me ke kumukūʻai. Ua hoʻomohala mua ʻia ʻo hCaptcha e kamaʻilio i kā mākou pono ponoʻī i ka lepili kiʻi ʻana, a ua loaʻa i kēia manawa no nā ʻoihana ʻē aʻe me nā makemake like.
about-content-text-2a: Hoʻonui pinepine ʻia nā mea hana ʻino ma ka pūnaewele. Akā ʻo ka mōhai ʻana i ka pilikino pilikino ʻaʻole ka pane.
about-content-text-2b: ʻO nā ʻōlelo palekana i hāʻawi ʻia e nā ʻoihana hoʻolaha e kia nui i ka huli ʻana i nā mea hoʻohana ma ka pūnaewele. Ua hana mākou i kahi hopena palekana kūpono e hōʻike ai i ka hōʻino ʻana i ka pilikino pilikino ʻaʻole pono e hāʻawi i nā hopena maikaʻi loa.
about-intro-head-2: Kulekele, palekana, a me ka aʻo ʻana i ka Mīkini.
about-intro-text: ʻO hCaptcha kahi lawelawe CAPTCHA kūʻokoʻa i hoʻohana nui ʻia ma ka honua.
about-leadership-alex: ʻIkepili Database a me Blockchain. ʻO ka ʻenekini mua ma Cloudera a me nā mea hou aʻe. Nā makahiki he ʻekahi o ka loea kūkulu hale lako polokalamu a me nā kime.
about-leadership-eli: Luna Nui. Alakaʻi ʻike ʻia ma AI. Ua noi i ka ʻike mīkini ma ka pālākiō i nā ʻano pilikia o nā ʻoihana ma nā makahiki he 20 i hala.
about-leadership-headsub: He kime mākaukau, e hana nei i nā pilikia paʻakikī o kēia lā.
about-leadership-text1: Hoʻolālā mākou i ke aʻo hohonu ʻana a me ka ʻike ʻana i ka mīkini kikowaena ʻike ma ka pālākiō, me kahi kikoʻī kikoʻī i ka hoʻopaʻa ʻana i nā ʻōnaehana pūnaewele mai ka hoʻoweliweli o ka hoʻoweliweli o kēia au.
about-leadership-text2: Me nā makahiki he mau makahiki o ka ʻike loea a me ka mīkini ʻike, kūkulu mākou a hana i nā ʻōnaehana nui e hiki ke pale i kekahi o nā pilikia paʻakikī o kēia lā me ka mālama ʻana i ka pilikino.
about-leadership-todd: PhD ma Computational Biology, Stanford. Ke hana nei me nā pūnaewele neural mai ka makahiki 1999. E kia i ka ML i noi ʻia a me ke aʻo hohonu ʻana i ka pālākiō.
acc-opt-but: E aʻo hou aʻe e pili ana i nā koho komo
acc-opt-text: Hiki ʻole ʻoe ke ʻike maka a i ʻole hiki ʻole ke hoʻopau i nā hCaptchas?
appreciate-in: Mahalo mākou i kāu hoʻokomo. E ʻike iā mākou i kekahi pilikia a e hoʻoponopono wikiwiki mākou iā lākou.
fb-but: E hoʻouna iā mākou i nā manaʻo
feedback-text: Hāʻawi i ka manaʻo pane ma ka hCaptcha āu i ʻike ai
footer-copyright-text: hCaptcha kahi inoa inoa inoa o Intuition Machines, Inc.
home-about-subtitle: Hoʻohana ʻia e ka Protocol HUMAN
home-about-text-1: Hoʻonohonoho ʻia ʻo hCaptcha e hoʻonā i ka pilikia nui o ka hana ma ke aʻo ʻana i ka mīkini: e lepili ʻana i nā nui o ka ʻikepili i kahi manawa kūpono, kūpono a hilinaʻi hoʻi.
home-about-text-2: ʻOi aku ka nui o ka ʻike i nā hopena maikaʻi aʻe i nā mīkini aʻo mīkini mīkini. ʻO ke kūleʻa hou o nā hiʻohiʻona hohonu i alakaʻi i ka nui o ka nui o nā hōkeo ʻikepili, kokoke mau me kekahi loiloi kanaka. Eia nō naʻe, ke lohi a me ke kumukūʻai hoʻi ka hoʻokumu ʻana i nā ʻikepili i ʻike ʻia e nā kānaka ma o ka Mechanical Turk, Figure Eight, a me nā mea ʻē aʻe.
home-about-text-3: Hāʻawi ʻo hCaptcha i nā pūnaewele e loaʻa kālā e lawelawe ana i kēia koi ʻoiai ke ālai ʻana i nā bot a me nā ʻano hana ʻino ʻē aʻe.
home-about-text-4: Hoʻohana ʻia ka mākeke hCaptcha e ka HUMAN Protocol, kahi protocol i wehe ʻia no ka loiloi kanaka e holo nei ma ka blockchain Ethereum. Loaʻa i nā pūnaewele i nā hōʻailona kanaka (HMT) ke hoʻohana nā mea hoʻohana i ka widget hCaptcha ma kā lākou pūnaewele, a uku nā ʻoihana aʻo mīkini i nā Token Kanaka e kiʻi i kā lākou ʻikepili.
home-benefits-head-1: ʻO ke kumukūʻai i ka lepili ʻikepili
home-benefits-text-1: Ua ʻike anei ʻoe i kēlā me kēia manawa ke kaomi ʻoe i ke kaʻa e kōkua nei ʻoe e hoʻomaʻamaʻa i nā ʻōnaehana mīkini mīkini ʻo Gigantic hoʻokahi no ka manuahi?
home-benefits-text-2: HCaptcha huli i kēia k modelkohu a puni. Ke hoʻohana ʻoe i hCaptcha, ʻimi nā hui i ka hana a kāu mea hoʻohana e hōʻoia ai i ko lākou lāhui kanaka. Loaʻa iā ʻoe nā makana.
home-benefits-text-3: Makemake ʻoe e hoʻihoʻi i kāu manawaleʻa punahele? Hāʻawi ʻo hCaptcha iā ʻoe e kākoʻo i nā manawaleʻa āu i koho ai me nā loaʻa āu e loaʻa ai mai ka hoʻohana ʻana iā ia. E ʻike koke nā mea hoʻohana ma kāu pūnaewele i kāu hāʻawi i ka manawaleʻa ma o ka hoʻomaʻamaʻa pono ʻana i ka interface hCaptcha.
home-challenge-text-1: Koho i nā kiʻi a pau i kūlike i ka hulina
home-challenge-text-2: E wehewehe i ka palena no nā mea
home-challenge-text-3: E ʻike i nā lepili like
home-challenges-text-1: ... a me nā hana maʻalahi ʻē aʻe. Maʻalahi no nā kānaka, paʻakikī no nā bots.
home-challenges-text-2: Loaʻa nā hana kūikawā no nā mea hoʻopuka ʻoihana.
home-ent-1: Ke nānā nei i kā mākou mōhai palekana ʻoihana?
home-ent-2: E kipa i kā mākou pūnaewele hoʻolaʻa hou: BotStop.com
home-ent-button: E aʻo hou: BotStop e hCaptcha
home-from-the-blog-value: Pehea e hana ai i nā hoʻonohonoho hoʻonohonoho paʻakikī hCaptcha
home-intro-body: Hoʻohana ʻoe i kahi captcha e kāpae i nā bots? pale ʻo hCaptcha i ka pilikino pilikino, uku i nā pūnaewele, a kōkua i nā ʻoihana e loaʻa i kā lākou ʻikepili i kapa ʻia. He pani kulu ia no reCAPTCHA: hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻololi i loko o nā minuke.
home-intro-head: Kāohi i nā boti hou aku. Hoʻomaka e pale i ka pilikino pilikino.
home-main-1: Pilikino. Palekana ʻOi aku ka wikiwiki. A uku mākou iā ʻoe e hoʻohana.
home-main-2c: ʻIke nā pūnaewele hoʻolaha i kāu poʻe kipa e like me ka huahana. No hCaptcha ka huahana ka hana a lākou e hoʻolako ai. ʻAʻole māua e nānā i kāu mea hoʻohana, pehea wale paha lākou e hana kolohe ai. Kākoʻo mākou i nā hana e like me Pass Pass, a hana ikaika e kaulike i ka pilikino a me ka palekana.
home-main-3c: Aia i kāu hoihoi a pololei kā mākou pono. hCaptcha ka mea paʻi-kia. Hana mākou e hāʻawi iā ʻoe i ka ʻikepili maoli a hāʻawi iā ʻoe e hoʻoholo pehea e hoʻohana ai. Hāʻawi ʻia nā captchas ʻē aʻe e nā ʻoihana hoʻolaha Gigantic. ʻO kēia ke kumu o kēlā me kēia bot a lākou e ālai ai e hōʻemi paha i kā lākou loaʻa kālā.
home-main-4: ʻOi aku ka maikaʻi o ka hoʻohana
home-main-4c: Hoʻohana ʻia nā mamana aʻo mīkini sophisticated e hCaptcha no ka hoʻoholo ʻana i ke kanaka. ʻAe kēia iā mākou e koi i nā hana hoʻonāukiuki liʻiliʻi mai kāu mea hoʻohana a lawe i ka liʻiliʻi o ko lākou manawa i ka hana ʻana, ʻoiai e hana nei i ka ʻikepili i kapa ʻia pono no ka lepili ʻana i nā mea kūʻai aku.
home-main-plans: manuahi ʻo hCaptcha e hoʻohana no nā mea paʻi o nā nui. Eia nō naʻe, no nā ʻoihana a me nā paepae e pono ai ka kaohi hou aʻe, loaʻa kā mākou mau ʻoihana hana.
home-main-plans2: pale ʻo hCaptcha ʻoihana i nā miliona o nā mea hoʻohana ma o he ʻumi miliona mau pūnaewele no kekahi o nā ʻoihana nui loa ma ka honua. E ʻoluʻolu kāhea iā mā forou no ka ʻike hou aku, a i ʻole kipa
home-main-plans3: pale ʻo hCaptcha ʻoihana i nā miliona o nā mea hoʻohana ma o he ʻumi miliona mau pūnaewele no kekahi o nā ʻoihana nui loa ma ka honua. E ʻoluʻolu kāhea iā mā forou no ka ʻike hou aku, a i ʻole kipa

home-plans-chart-row-2-cell-1: Hoʻohana i ka ʻikepili hoʻokūkū i hoʻohana ʻia
home-plans-chart-row-3-cell-1: Loaʻa i nā uku no nā hoʻonā kanaka

home-plans-chart-row-6-cell-1: Kulekele pilikino GDPR a me CCPA-aloha
home-plans-chart-row-8-cell-1: E neenee i kāu ʻike ponoʻī
home-plans-chart-row-9-cell-1: ʻO ka hoʻonohonoho hoʻonohonoho paʻakikī ʻana ma muli o ka manawa
home-try-it-out-text: Hāʻawi ʻo hCaptcha i ka ʻike maʻalahi, maʻalahi, a hilinaʻi hoʻi i ka ʻike ʻole ʻana i nā kānaka e hoʻoponopono.
labeling-about-text-1: Hoʻonohonoho ʻia ʻo hCaptcha e hoʻonā i ka pilikia nui o ka hana ma ke aʻo ʻana i ka mīkini; ka lepili ʻana i ka nui o ka ʻikepili i ke ala kūpono, kūpono, a hilinaʻi hoʻi. ʻOi aku ka nui o ka ʻike i nā hopena maikaʻi aʻe i nā mīkini aʻo mīkini mīkini. ʻO ke kūleʻa hou o nā hiʻohiʻona hohonu i alakaʻi i ka nui o ka nui o nā waihona, a lawelawe ʻo hCaptcha i kēia pono.
labeling-about-text-2: Eia nō naʻe, hana lohi a pipiʻi hoʻi ka hoʻokumu ʻana i nā waihona ʻike loiloi nui kanaka e hoʻohana ana i nā kuʻuna kuʻuna. He ala ʻo hCaptcha no nā ʻoihana e loaʻa ai nā anotations a lākou e koi wikiwiki ai, me ke kiʻekiʻe kiʻekiʻe a me ke kumukūʻai haʻahaʻa ma mua o nā koho ʻē aʻe.
labeling-annotations-text-1: ʻIke i nā mea pololei i nā kiʻi a me ke wikiō
labeling-annotations-text-2: ʻIke i nā mea pololei i nā kiʻi a me ke wikiō
labeling-annotations-text-3: Kuhikuhi nā anotations no nā hihia hoʻohana like ʻole
labeling-annotations-text-4: Hoʻokaʻina a hoʻopili paha i nā waeʻano ākea o kēlā me kēia nui
labeling-annotations-text-5: ʻImi a me ka hoʻonohonoho ʻana o ka mana o kānaka
labeling-annotations-text-6: Pono i kahi ʻano ʻē aʻe i helu ʻole ʻia ma aneʻi? E nīnau wale iā mākou.
labeling-annotations-title-4: Ka wehewehe ʻana i ke ʻano
labeling-annotations-title-6: ... a me nā mea hou aku
labeling-ent-button: Kāhea aku i kā mākou Hui Pāʻoihana Pāʻoihana
labeling-ent-text-1: Hāʻawi ka HUMAN Platform ma hope o hCaptcha i ka maikaʻi hana sophisticated a me nā hiʻohiʻona hoʻokele ma o ka premise, hybrid, a i ʻole nā SaaS mea i hoʻopili ʻia e hoʻopili me kāu ʻōnaehana i kēia manawa.
labeling-ent-text-2: Holo holoʻokoʻa holoʻokoʻa me kāu limahana ponoʻī, helu waiwai i hoʻopau ʻia ma waena o nā ʻoihana ʻoihana a i ʻole nā consortium hoa, koho alualu i nā hana i nā mea lawelawe kūloko a kūwaho hoʻi e pili ana i nā koina a me nā koi palekana, a me nā mea hou aʻe.
labeling-ent-text-3: Ke kōkua maʻalahi o API, nā dashboard nani, a me ka ʻenehana hoʻohālikelike hou loa e hoʻonui i ka pono.
labeling-ent-text-4: 99.99% uptime SLAs a me 24/7 global kākoʻo i loaʻa. No ka ʻike hou aku:
labeling-features-head-1: ʻO nā paipu paipai ʻia API maʻalahi.
labeling-features-head-2: Hoʻomalu ʻia no ke kumukūʻai a me ka maikaʻi. ʻAʻohe koi i mua e koi ʻia.
labeling-features-head-3: E uku wale no ka pololei āu e makemake ai.
labeling-features-head-4: Hāʻawi i kāu ʻikepili ʻoiaʻiʻo o ka honua a i ʻole e kūkulu mākou iā ia i ka lele.
labeling-features-text-1: Makemake e hoʻohui pono i ka loiloi kanaka i kāu hana ʻoihana? Hāʻawi mākou i nā SLA hilinaʻi nui, ka hiki ke hōʻoia ʻia, a me nā API REST maʻalahi.
labeling-features-text-2: Hoʻohana ka paepae HUMAN i nā hiʻohiʻona hilinaʻi piha e hana i ka loiloi maikaʻi maoli maoli. ʻAe kēia iā mākou e hoʻoholo wikiwiki i ka paʻakikī o nā nīnau a me kā lākou pane kūpono kūpono paha, e mālama ai i kou manawa a me kāu kālā.
labeling-features-text-3: ʻAʻole like nā pilikia āpau. ʻO nā Annotations no nā hana kūpilikiʻi e koi ai iā 99.99% hilinaʻi mai nā limahana kanaka āpau. ʻO nā Annotations no kahi hiʻohiʻona beta i kahi polokalamu pāʻani pūnaewele pono wale nō ka hilinaʻi kaulike. Hoʻoholo ʻoe.
labeling-features-text-4: Loaʻa iā ʻoe kahi ʻikepili maka me ka ʻole o kahi hoʻonohonoho hōʻoia holoʻokoʻa? I ka hapanui o nā hihia hiki iā mākou ke kūkulu i hoʻokahi no ʻoe ke holo nā hana ma o ka ʻōnaehana, a i ʻole hana i nā laʻana i kahakaha ʻia no kāu ʻae.
labeling-info-head: Ke kiʻi ʻia nei o ka ʻikepili
labeling-info-text-1: E kamaʻilio me kekahi o kā mākou poʻe loea kikowaena e wehewehe i kāu makemake e pono ai ka papahana: target target, format, and any special koi.
labeling-info-text-2: Hana mākou i kahi hana hana liʻiliʻi e pili ana i kāu ʻikepili hāpana. Hōʻike kēia i ka hana a mākou i hana pū ai e ʻike pono i ka mea āu e pono ai.
labeling-info-text-3: Me ko mākou kiʻekiʻe kiʻekiʻe a me ka latency haʻahaʻa e huli wikiwiki mākou i kāu hana, me ka lawe automate ke pau.
labeling-info-text-4: E like me mākou e ʻike pono ai i nā palena o kāu hana hana, e hoʻomau mau nā hopena i ka holo ʻana o ka manawa.
labeling-info-text-5: ʻAe nā dashboard ola iā ʻoe e hāʻawi i ka pane a i ʻole ka hoʻomaha ʻana i ka hana i kēlā me kēia manawa.
labeling-main-1: ʻO ka lepili ʻikepili waiwai kumukūʻai ma ka pālākiō
labeling-main-1-button: E kiʻi i kāu ʻikepili i kau inoa ʻia i kēia manawa
labeling-main-1c: Pono i mau lepili hou aʻe no kāu ʻikepili? Hāʻawi ʻo hCaptcha i ka wikiwiki, maikaʻi, a me ke ʻano kiʻekiʻe o ka ʻikepili ʻana no nā ʻoihana e hana nei i ka noi hana ʻepekema a me nā mīkini aʻo mīkini.
labeling-main-2: E neʻe koke i mau hana he miliona.
labeling-main-2-button: Kūʻai i nā lawelawe lepili ʻikepili
labeling-main-2c: hCaptcha kekahi o nā loko wai nui loa ma ka honua i loaʻa no kāu hoʻohana. ʻO kēlā me kēia pālākiō, hiki iā mākou ke lawelawe me ka ʻole o ka hoʻohiki mua i mua. ʻAʻole pilikia nā miliona o nā hana i kēlā me kēia lā.
labeling-platform-head: ʻIkepili pilikino a i ʻole lehulehu
labeling-platform-text: Kūkulu ʻia ʻo hCaptcha ma luna o ka HUMAN Platform, e ʻae ai i ka hoʻokele sophisticated a me ka hōʻiliʻili ʻana e hoʻonui i ka uku a me ka maikaʻi i kēlā me kēia kaʻina. E ʻae kēia ʻenehana i ka poʻe limahana kūpono e lawelawe i kēlā me kēia ʻāpana o kāu hana, e hoʻonui ana i ka maikaʻi o ke kumukūʻai ʻoiai e mālama ana i ka pilikino a me ka hālāwai ʻana i nā koi hoʻokele e pili ana.
labeling-try-button: Kūʻai i nā lawelawe lepili ʻikepili
labeling-try-head: Makemake ʻoe e hoʻāʻo me kāu ʻikepili?
labeling-try-text: ... mākaukau mākou inā ʻoe: loaʻa kā mākou lawelawe a puni ka uaki.
learn-more-hcaptcha: E aʻo hou e pili ana i hCaptcha
page-acc-faq-1: Nīnau: Aia paha ka hCaptcha Māhele 508 + WCAG 2.1 AA e kūlike? Pane: Manaʻo mākou pēlā: ʻo nā mea hoʻohana a pau me nā ʻano hemahema i hiki ke nānā i ka pūnaewele a komo i nā huaʻōlelo i nā palapala hiki ke komo i nā lawelawe i pale ʻia e hCaptcha ma ke kau inoa ʻana. Eia naʻe, ʻaʻole kēia he ʻōlelo aʻoaʻo kū kānāwai: pono ʻoe e hana i kāu loiloi ponoʻī, e noʻonoʻo ana i kāu hoʻokō ponoʻī e hōʻoia ai ʻo kēia ka hihia no kāu hana.
page-acc-faq-2: Nīnau: Ke hana nei ʻoe ma nā koho ʻē aʻe (a11y), e like me ka leo? Pane: ʻO nā koho i makemake nui ʻia e like me nā captchas leo e hoʻokae i ka nui o nā mea hoʻohana a11y a eo maʻalahi ʻia e nā ʻenehana aʻo mīkini hou. Ua hoʻokau kēia i nā luʻi leo o kēia manawa e lilo i mea ʻoi aku ka paʻakikī, e hoʻolauna nei i ka walaʻau, ka manawa ʻokoʻa, nā hui huaʻōlelo ʻokoʻa, a pēlā aku e eo ai ka poʻe hoʻouka kaua. No laila ʻaʻole mākou hoihoi nui e pili ana i kēia hana vs. pale aku i nā pilikia nui, akā e noʻonoʻo mākou inā he koi mai kahi kaiāulu a11y. Eia nō naʻe, hoihoi nui mākou i ka Pass Privacy no ka hihia hoʻohana Accessibility. Manaʻo mākou i ka hoʻohui ʻana i kā mākou ala a11y o kēia manawa me ka hoʻopuka ʻana o Privacy Pass e ʻae ai i nā mea hoʻohana a11y e mākaʻikaʻi me ka palekana, i ka ʻike ʻoi aku ka pilikino o kā lākou kalepa, ʻoiai e kaohi ana i ka hōʻino ʻia e nā mea lawelawe bot ʻaʻole hiki ke ʻike ʻia ke loaʻa nā koho a11y. Komo mākou i ka hui hana IETF hana maʻamau i kēia ʻenehana hou.
page-acc-faq-3: Nīnau: Pehea e pili ana i ka pilikino? Ke hōʻike nei ke kau inoa i nā ʻike kele a11y i kekahi ʻano? He aha kāu hana me ka leka uila? Pane: Hoʻonohonoho ʻia ʻo hCaptcha no ka pilikino mai ka honua a luna. He ʻokoʻa loa ia ma mua o nā koho kuʻuna e like me reCAPTCHA i mālama ʻia e nā pūnaewele hoʻolaha, nāna ka manaʻo e hoʻāʻo iā ʻoe a puni ka pūnaewele a hoʻopili iā ʻoe me kahi ʻike maoli. ʻAʻole loa mākou e hoʻohana i nā leka uila a i ʻole ka ʻike no kekahi kumu ʻē aʻe ma mua o ka kōkua ʻana i ka hoʻohana a me ka pale ʻana i ka hana ʻino. Loaʻa i kā mākou kulekele pilikino i nā pane ākea a me ka mana e pili ana i ka hoʻohana ʻana i ka ʻikepili, akā ʻo ka pane pōkole ʻaʻole mākou hoihoi i ka hoʻopili ʻana iā ʻoe ma ke ʻano he kanaka me kāu mōʻaukala kele pūnaewele. Ke hana nei mākou i kēia manawa i kahi hopena cryptographic e hoʻolei koke i kāu leka uila. ʻoiai e mālama nei i ko mākou hiki ke pale i ka hōʻino, kākoʻo i kā mākou hana Pass Pass.
page-acc-link-1: Inā ʻoe he hoʻohana maʻalahi, e ʻoluʻolu e kau inoa ma aneʻi.
page-acc-subhead: Ka hōʻoia ʻana i ke komo seamless no nā mea hoʻohana āpau me ka mālama ʻana i ka palekana
page-acc-summary-contents-1: Hoʻonohonoho ʻia ʻo hCaptcha e hoʻōki i nā bots ma ka hoʻokaʻawale ʻana iā lākou mai ka poʻe. ʻO nā hoʻokolohua ʻike he mea pono maʻalahi no kēia, akā ʻaʻole hiki i nā mea āpau ke hoʻonā i kahi pilikia nui. No kēia kumu ua hoʻolālā mākou i kahi ala ʻokoʻa maʻalahi ʻole e ʻae i nā mea paʻi puke e hoʻohana nei i kā mākou lawelawe i ke komo ʻana no nā mea āpau me ka paukū piha ʻo 508 a me WCAG 2.1 AA.
page-acc-summary-contents-2: Pehea e hana ai: ʻo ka mea mua, hōʻailona ka mea hoʻohana maʻalahi i kēia URL, i hoʻopili ʻia ma ka ʻaoʻao info hCaptcha widget. Hāʻawi ʻia lākou i kahi kuki kuhi kuhi ʻia i hiki ke hoʻohana ʻia i nā manawa he nui i kēlā me kēia lā, akā pono e hōʻoluʻolu i kēlā me kēia 24 mau hola ma o ka ʻeʻe ʻana.
page-acc-tr-body:
Nīnau: Ke ʻike nei nō wau i kahi pilikia ma hope o ka hoʻonohonoho ʻana i ka kuki. He aha ke kumu o kēia?
Pane: Kuhi ʻia kēia ma muli o ka hoʻohana ʻana i kahi ad blocker a i ʻole anti-cookie extension, a i ʻole kahi hoʻonohonoho e ālai ana i nā kuki pūnaewele ākea, i kēia hihia kahi kuki no hcaptcha.com i hoʻonohonoho ʻia a nānā ʻia e ka hCaptcha JS ma kahi pūnaewele ʻokoʻa. , e like me kāu e kipa aku nei.

Hana nā kuki hiki ke kiʻi hCaptcha me nā polokalamu kele pūnaewele kaulana āpau a me nā blockers hoʻolaha me kā lākou hoʻonohonoho maʻamau, no laila maʻamau nā holomua ma muli o nā anti-anti-adblock scripts a i ʻole nā rula like e kuhikuhi ana i nā pūnaewele.

Pāʻoihana:

1. Whitelist hcaptcha.com a me * .hcaptcha.com kuki i kāu ad blocker a i ʻole ka loiloi palekana palekana.
2. Inā ʻoe e hoʻohana nei i ka polokalamu mākaʻikaʻi ʻo Brave, ka mea ʻaʻole i loaʻa i kēia manawa kekahi ʻano cookie whitelist, e hele i nā Prefers -> Shields -> nā kuki a koho i nā kuki āpau.
3. Inā ʻoe e hoʻohana nei i ka mana hou loa o Safari ma ka OS X 10.15 i hoʻokuʻu ʻia a i ʻole iOS 13.4 i kēia manawa, ua hoʻololi wale ʻo Apple i ke ʻano o Safari e pili ana i nā kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu, ka pale ʻana iā lākou āpau i ka paʻamau. Ke hoʻokō nei mākou i kahi hopena, akā i kēia manawa e ʻoluʻolu e kipa iā Safari Prefers, paukū pilikino, a me ka nānā ʻole i ka huli ʻana i ka pūnaewele: Pale i ka huli ʻana ma waena o ka pūnaewele i hiki ai i ka kuki komo ke hana e like me ka mea i manaʻo ʻia

Nīnau: Hoʻohana wau i nā hāmeʻa he nui. Pono wau e kau inoa i nā manawa he nui?
Pane: ʻAʻole. E kaomi i ka loulou leka uila like i hoʻouna ʻia iā ʻoe ma kēlā me kēia hāmeʻa āu e hoʻohana ai i mea e hoʻonohonoho ai i ka kuki.

Nīnau: Pehea e hiki ai iaʻu ke pale aku iaʻu iho mai ka ʻimi ʻana i ka kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu ʻoiai e hoʻohana ana i ka kuki komo?
Pane: Ke hoʻohana nei i kekahi pilikino a i ʻole hoʻolaha hoʻolaha e kākoʻo ana i ka whitelisting pae pae (e like me uBlock Origin) e hana e like me ka mea i manaʻo ʻia: e hōʻoia e whitelist hcaptcha.com.
page-acc-tr-title: No nā mea hoʻohana maʻalahi: nā nīnau pinepine a me nā alakaʻi pilikia
page-acc-tr2-body:
Safari
E hiki ai i nā kuki ma Safari (Mac): E hele i ka papa kuhikuhi iho o lalo o Safari. Koho i nā makemake. Kaomi aku i ka pilikino ma ka panela luna. Ma lalo o 'Block cookies' koho i ke koho 'Never.'
E hiki ai i nā kuki ma Safari (iPhone / iPad iOS 11+): E wehe i kāu hoʻonohonoho. Pepa i lalo a koho iā Safari. Ma lalo o ka pilikino a me ka palekana, e hoʻopau iā 'Prevent Cross-Site Tracking' a me 'Block All Cookies'

Firefox
Kaomi ma ka pale kaua i ka hema o ka helu wahi ma kahi pūnaewele. Kaomi aku i nā hoʻonohonoho pale. E wehe ʻia ka ʻaoʻao ʻo Firefox Prefers Privacy & Security. Ma lalo o ka pale ʻana i ka mālama pono ʻana, koho i ka Mana Lima. Koho i nā trackers a me nā script e keʻa ma ke koho ʻana i kēlā mau pahu pane. E nānā pono ua wehe ʻoe i ka hcaptcha.com.

Hiki iā ʻoe ke kāpae i kekahi manawa i kekahi mau pale ma Custom e debug i kēia, ma ke kāpae ʻana i nā pahuhoho: Hōʻalo i ka pahu huli nā Trackers a i ʻole wehe i ke koho ʻana i nā pahu Cookies inā e loaʻa mau ana nā pilikia.

ʻO Google Chrome
Google Chrome (PC)
Koho i ka ikona menu Chrome. Koho i nā koho.
E hele i ka pilikino a me ka palekana, a laila ʻo Kuki a me nā ʻikepili pūnaewele ʻē aʻe.
E nānā pono 'ālai' nā kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu '.

Google Chrome (Mac):
E wehe i nā koho Chrome mai ka papa kuhikuhi kahua paʻa.
E hele i ka pilikino a me ka palekana, a laila ʻo Kuki a me nā ʻikepili pūnaewele ʻē aʻe.
E nānā pono 'ālai' nā kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu '.

Google Chrome (Android):
Ma kāu polokalamu Android, wehe i ka polokalamu Chrome.
Ma ka ʻaoʻao ʻākau o luna, piula wai hou a laila hoʻonohonoho.
Piula i nā hoʻonohonoho pūnaewele a laila nā kuki.
Ma ka ʻaoʻao aʻe o 'Cookies,' e kuapo i ka hoʻonohonoho.
E hōʻoia i ka pahu ma hope o ka 'ʻae i nā kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu.'

Internet Explorer
1. Koho i nā kapa i ke kihi ʻākau ma luna o ka pale, a laila koho i 'nā koho Pūnaewele'. Inā loaʻa iā ʻoe ka papa ʻaina Menu, hiki iā ʻoe ke koho i nā 'Mea Hana' a laila 'Nā koho Pūnaewele'.
2. Kaomi i ka 'Privacy' tab.
3. Koho i ke pihi 'Pae holomua'.
4. Ma lalo o 'Kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu' koho 'ʻAe'.
5. Kaomi 'OK'
page-acc-tr2-head: Nā Kuhi Browser no nā Kuki Kūʻai Kūʻai
priv-hc-text: ʻIke nā pūnaewele hoʻolaha iā ʻoe ma ke ʻano he huahana. ʻAʻole mākou. ʻAʻole māua e mālama i nā mea hoʻohana, pehea wale paha lākou e kolohe ai. Kākoʻo mākou i nā hana e like me Pass Pass, a hana ikaika e kaulike i ka pilikino a me ka palekana.
reporting-bugs-accessibility-button: E aʻo hou aʻe e pili ana i nā koho komo
reporting-bugs-accessibility-text: Hiki ʻole ʻoe ke ʻike maka a i ʻole hiki ʻole ke hoʻopau i nā hCaptchas?
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-head: Ka hopu ʻana i nā kikoʻī o ka hōʻike Bug: Firefox
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-1: KaʻAnuʻu 1: Wehe i nā Mea Hana Mea Hoʻolālā (Hoʻomaka kēia e hoʻopaʻa i ke kau.)
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-2: KaʻAnuʻu Hana 2: Kaomi ma ka pihi Pūnaewele i nā Mea Hana Hoʻolālā. E hōʻoia i ka pahu lāʻau Persist ma luna.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-3: Ka Papa Hana 3: e kipa iā https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, a i ʻole pūnaewele paha e loaʻa nei kahi pilikia ma (Palapala Kahakaha: inā ʻaʻole ʻoe e noʻonoʻo e kaʻana like he aha ia) ... a laila kaomi i ka I pihi kanaka, a hoʻāʻo e hoʻoholo.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-4: KaʻAnuʻu Hana 4: Kaomi iā HAR ma hope o kou hoʻāʻo ʻana e hoʻoponopono, a koho iā Save All as HAR e mālama i ka loiloi pūnaewele. E hoʻouna i kēlā faila iā mākou.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-5: KaʻAnuʻu Hana 5: Kaomi ma ka ʻaoʻao Console, a kaomi pono a laila koho i nā mea āpau a mālama i kēlā i loko o kahi faila kikokikona, i mea e mālama ai i ka log console. E hoʻouna iā mākou i kēlā.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-6: ʻAnuʻu hope: E leka uila iā mākou i kēlā HAR a me nā ʻoluʻolu log log iā mākou, a wehewehe i ka pilikia E hoʻohana: kākoʻo@hcaptcha.com (e ʻoluʻolu e hoʻohana i kahi lawelawe e like me Dropbox a i ʻole Filebin a hoʻouna i nā loulou) a koho i kahi screenshot, inā manaʻo ʻoe aia kekahi mea ʻaʻole hōʻike pono. . E ʻoluʻolu e hoʻouna i ka IP āu e hoʻohana nei pū kekahi. Hiki iā ʻoe ke kiʻi mai https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Mahalo no ka lawe ʻana i ka manawa e kōkua iā mākou e loaʻa i kēia ʻike. Kūleʻa mākou e hana maikaʻi i ka hCaptcha no nā mea āpau.
reporting-bugs-guide-head: Ka hopu ʻana i nā kikoʻī o ka hōʻike Bug: Chrome
reporting-bugs-guide-step-1: KaʻAnuʻu 1: Wehe i nā Mea Hana Mea Hoʻolālā (Hoʻomaka kēia e hoʻopaʻa i ke kau.)
reporting-bugs-guide-step-2: KaʻAnuʻu Hana 2: Kaomi ma ka pihi Pūnaewele i nā Mea Hana Hoʻolālā. E hōʻoia i ka pahu mālama lāʻau mālama ma luna.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-3: Ka Papa Hana 3: e kipa iā https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, a i ʻole pūnaewele paha e loaʻa nei kahi pilikia ma (Palapala Kahakaha: inā ʻaʻole ʻoe e noʻonoʻo e kaʻana like he aha ia) ... a laila kaomi i ka I pihi kanaka, a hoʻāʻo e hoʻoholo.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-4: Ka Papa Hana 4: Kaomi iā Export HAR (ka pua liʻiliʻi i lalo) ma hope o kou hoʻāʻo ʻana e hoʻoponopono, kahi e mālama ai i ka loiloi pūnaewele. E hoʻouna i kēlā faila iā mākou.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-5: KaʻAnuʻu Hana 5: Kaomi ma ka ʻaoʻao Console, a kaomi pono a laila Save as .. i mea e mālama ai i ka log console. E hoʻouna iā mākou i kēlā.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-6: Ka hopena hope loa: E leka uila iā mākou i kēlā mau HAR a me nā log log console iā mākou, a wehewehe i ka pilikia. Hoʻohana: support@hcaptcha.com (e ʻoluʻolu e hoʻohana i kahi lawelawe e like me Dropbox a i ʻole Filebin a hoʻouna i nā loulou) a koho i kahi screenshot, inā manaʻo ʻoe aia kekahi mea ʻaʻole hōʻike pono. E ʻoluʻolu e hoʻouna i ka IP āu e hoʻohana nei pū kekahi. Hiki iā ʻoe ke kiʻi mai https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Mahalo no ka lawe ʻana i ka manawa e kōkua iā mākou e loaʻa i kēia ʻike. Kūleʻa mākou e hana maikaʻi i ka hCaptcha no nā mea āpau.
reporting-bugs-guide-text-1: ʻO ka hoʻouna ʻana i ka ʻikepili debugging me kāu hōʻike e maʻalahi ai iā mākou e ʻike i nā mea e hana nei. Eia nā kuhikuhi ʻanuʻu-ma-ʻanuʻu:
reporting-bugs-guide-text-2: Inā ʻoe he mea hoʻomohala pūnaewele a mea hoʻohana loea paha, makemake mākou i ka hōʻuluʻulu manaʻo e hoʻouna iā mākou iā mākou i kahi pūnaewele hoʻopaʻa HAR a me nā loulou console pūnaewele. E ʻoluʻolu e hoʻāʻo i ka hoʻopau ʻana i kekahi hoʻolaha blocker a i ʻole nā mea hoʻomalu palekana pūnaewele a laila ho'āʻo hou ma mua o kou hele ʻana i kēia mau ʻanuʻu. Inā hoʻoponopono kēlā i kāu pilikia, mahalo nui mākou iā ʻoe e hōʻike ana iā mākou i kāu mana o kāu polokalamu kele pūnaewele, blocker ad a extension browser, a me ka pūnaewele pūnaewele URL.
reporting-bugs-intro-head: Loaʻa i kahi kiki? Eia pehea e hōʻike ai.
reporting-bugs-intro-text: Hoʻohana nā miliona o ka poʻe i ka hCaptcha i kēlā me kēia mahina, ma nā kaukani o nā hui pūnaewele, nā mea hoʻolōʻihi, nā hāmeʻa, nā pale uila, a me nā mea hou aʻe. ʻO kā mākou pahuhopu e hōʻoia e hana mau ia nāu, no laila mahalo nui mākou i kāu hōʻike! E hāʻawi i nā pane wikiwiki, kaomi wale i ka pihi hoʻouna iā mākou. Inā ʻoe e ʻike nei i kahi pilikia hana, e ʻoluʻolu e hāhai i nā ʻōkuhi log debug no Chrome a i ʻole nā kuhikuhi log debug no Firefox ma lalo. No nā mea ʻimi pūnaewele ʻē aʻe e leka uila iā mākou. No nā pilikia palekana a pilikino paha e ʻike ai, e ʻike i nā ʻōkuhi ma lalo.
reporting-bugs-privacy-text: ʻAʻole māua e mālama i nā mea hoʻohana, pehea paha lākou e kolohe ai i nā mīkini paha. Kākoʻo mākou i nā hana e like me Pass Pass, a hana ikaika e kaulike i ka pilikino a me ka palekana. Inā ua loaʻa iā ʻoe kahi pilikia e manaʻo ai ʻoe e hoʻopili i ka pilikino pilikino, e ʻoluʻolu e leka uila iā mākou ma support@hcaptcha.com.
reporting-bugs-provide-feedback-button: E hoʻouna iā mākou i nā manaʻo
reporting-bugs-provide-feedback-head: Hāʻawi i nā manaʻo pane koke ma hCaptcha
reporting-bugs-provide-feedback-text: Mahalo mākou i kāu hoʻokomo. E ʻike iā mākou i kekahi pilikia a e hoʻoponopono wikiwiki mākou iā lākou.
reporting-bugs-security-text: Makemake mau mākou i ka loaʻa ʻana o nā hōʻike o nā pilikia palekana. Kahi leka uila kākoʻo@hcaptcha.com & CC security@hcaptcha.com a e hoʻi wikiwiki mākou iā ʻoe. Loaʻa iā mākou kahi papahana makana bug no nā hōʻike palekana kūpono i ka lawelawe hCaptcha a me ka code source e pili ana.

sales-interstitial-c1b: E aʻo hou aʻe e pili ana i hCaptcha Enterprise (BotStop)
sales-interstitial-c1d: Kūʻai i nā lawelawe hoʻolaha hCaptcha

sales-interstitial-head: E hōʻoia e kiʻi iā ʻoe i kahi kūpono.
sec-hc-text: hCaptcha ka mea paʻi-kia. Hana mākou e hāʻawi i nā ʻike maoli i nā pūnaewele a e hoʻoholo iā lākou pehea e hoʻohana ai. Aia i kāu hoihoi a pololei kā mākou pono. Hāʻawi ʻia nā captchas ʻē aʻe e nā ʻoihana hoʻolaha. ʻO nā bot āpau a lākou i ālai ai e hōʻemi paha i kā lākou loaʻa kālā.
signup-interstitial-c1: No nā ʻoihana a pūnaewele paha
signup-interstitial-c1b: Hoʻohui hCaptcha no nā mea hoʻopuka i kaʻu pūnaewele a i ʻole polokalamu

switch-to-english-link: E kuapo i ka ʻōlelo Pelekania
what-is-hcaptcha-text: Kōkua ʻo hCaptcha i kāu lawelawe pūnaewele punahele e kāpae i nā bot, spam, a me ka hoʻomāinoino e ka nīnau ʻana i nā nīnau maʻalahi maʻalahi no nā kānaka a paʻakikī hoʻi no nā mīkini.
why-hc-text: I kēlā me kēia manawa āu e pane ai i kahi pilikia, hoʻohana mākou i nā hiʻohiʻona laulā e ʻike ai inā he kanaka a mīkini paha ʻoe. ʻO ka pūnaewele āu i kipa ai a laila hoʻohana i kēia hopena e kōkua i ka hoʻomaikaʻi ʻana i kāu ʻike ma kā lākou pūnaewele ma ka mālama ʻana i nā bot.
